channel.title: Help me please!
channel.description: Would someone please show me step by step of how to make a safe zone? Please! I am using allstar scape and I want to make alot of places non wildy mostly everything but wildy.

item.title: Help me please!
item.dc:creator: @nightmare2013 nightmare2013
item.description:
@nightmare2013 wrote:

its actually really easy once you get the hang of it but it is very hard to grasp the concept

search in client.java for public boolean nonWild() {
then where it has all those codes under this one ( if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431))

put this
|| (absX >= lowestX && absX <= highestx && absY >= lowestY && absY <= HighestY)
fill all those with stars with the right coordinates(east and west are always x and north and south are always Y) (its gonna make a sqaure unwild)
so if i wanted to make this unwild
X=1
________
| |
Y=3 | |Y=10
| |
------------
X=5
It would look like
|| (absX >= 1 && absX <= 5 && absY >= 3 && absY <= 10)
if you need any more help just look me up on msn (nightmare2013@live.com)

Read full topic
